channel.title: Click to continue color
channel.description:
Alright , first of all i don't know if this is client or server sided.Basically all i want to do is to change the color and hover color of the text "Click here to continue".
My Current one : [img]http://i.imgur.com/gMl5z.png[/img]
What i want : [img]http://i.imgur.com/S9wM2.png[/img]
All i've found is that [code] chatTextDrawingArea.drawText(0, aString844, 60, 259); chatTextDrawingArea.drawText(128, "Click to continue", 80, 259);[/code]
PS : Don't tell me now to add @blu@ infront of it.
